jlyrics.features

Class NumberOfWords

  • java.lang.Object
    • jlyrics.features.LyricsFeatureExtractor
      • jlyrics.features.NumberOfWords

  • public class NumberOfWords
extends LyricsFeatureExtractor
    A feature extractor that extracts the total number of words in a text. This count is not of unique words, so words that occur more than once will be counted more than once. Whitespace characters are not counted as words.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class jlyrics.features.LyricsFeatureExtractor

        external_dependencies, feature_dependencies, feature_description

    • Method Detail

      • extractFeature

        public double[] extractFeature(SongLyrics lyrics,
                               double[][] other_feature_values,
                               java.lang.Object[][] external_information)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Extract this feature from given song lyrics.
        Specified by:
        extractFeature in class LyricsFeatureExtractor
        Parameters:
        lyrics - The lyrics to extract the feature from.
        other_feature_values - Ignored (not needed to calculate this feature).
        external_information - Ignored (not needed to calculate this feature).
        Returns:
        The extracted feature value. Null if the feature cannot be extracted from the given data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an informative exception if invalid data is provided.
